results.title: Hyprland - ArchWiki
results.content: HyprlandHyprlandis an independent tiling Wayland compositor written in C++. Noteworthy features ofHyprlandinclude dynamic tiling, tabbed windows, a clean and readable C++ code-base, and a custom renderer that provides window animations, rounded corners, and Dual-Kawase Blur on transparent windows.

results.title: Installing the Much Hyped Hyprland on Linux - It's FOSS
results.content: Hyprlandis a dynamic tiling window compositor that is popular amongLinuxricing enthusiasts. Learn how to installHyprlandonArchLinuxusing archinstall script or base install, and on Ubuntu using a third-party repository.

results.title: Hyprland on Arch — Minimal Setup Guide
results.content: We're going to be usingArchlinuxtoday, buthyprlandis available on most distrobutions, so if you are a NixOS user, or Gentoo, or even Debian, check out the wiki for installation instructions, but other than that, the customization aspect of this guide will still apply to you.
